78640.issue: ZIP spans CenterPoint and Texas Gas Service boundary. Multiple MUDs for water.
78640.recommendation: Always verify with SERP. Cap confidence at 'high' without user confirmation.

78653.issue: Multiple MUDs, city water, and Oncor/Bluebonnet electric boundary.
78653.recommendation: Require subdivision name for accurate match.

78610.issue: ZIP spans CenterPoint and Texas Gas Service boundary.

75013.issue: City of Allen, North Texas MUD 1, and other MUDs overlap.

30004.issue: Multiple water providers: Fulton County, City of Alpharetta, North Fulton.

85286.issue: SRP and APS electric boundary. Multiple water districts.
85286.recommendation: Use utility company address lookup tools.

Hays|TX.issue: County spans CenterPoint, Texas Gas Service, and propane-only areas.
Hays|TX.recommendation: Do not use county-level gas matching. Require ZIP or address verification.

Williamson|TX.issue: High density of MUDs and WSCs. Oncor/Pedernales boundary.
Williamson|TX.recommendation: Check MUD database. Verify electric co-op status.

Maricopa|AZ.issue: SRP/APS boundary runs through county. Dozens of water districts.

FL.issue: High CDD density. Most new construction served by CDDs, not cities.
FL.recommendation: Check CDD database before city water utility.

TX.issue: Over 1,200 MUDs statewide. New developments almost always in MUDs.
TX.recommendation: Check MUD database for addresses in new subdivisions.

CO.issue: ~1,800 metro districts. Most provide water/sewer in suburbs.
